## Description The image is a logo featuring the brand name "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently. ## K 2 POWER CONTROL HOME Mit unterstützendem Anwendungsberater via App: der Kärcher K 2 Power Control-Hochdruckreiniger für die Reinigung von z.B. Fahrrädern, Gartenwerkzeugen oder Gartenmöbeln inkl. Home Kit. ## Key-Value Pair Bestell-Nr.: 1.673-603.0 ## Text from Document - Pistole mit Click Vario Power-Strahlrohr - Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff - Strahlrohrverstauung ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278796116
Stromart V / Hz 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 110 / 2 - max. 11
Fördermenge l/h max. 360
Flächenleistung m²/h 20
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1.4
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 4
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 6.7
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 246 × 280 × 586
## Ausstattung
Home Kit Flächenreiniger T 1, Reinigungsmittel Patio & Deck, 0.5 l
Hochdruckpistole [x]
Vario Power Jet [x]
Click Vario Power-Strahlrohr [ ]
Dreckfräser [ ]
HD-Schlauch 5 m
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugung
Teleskopgriff [ ]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
*Note: "Im Lieferumfang enthalten" is indicated with an asterisk in the document.* ## Description The image shows a yellow pressure washer set, which includes several components: 1. **Pressure Washer Unit**: - The main body is predominantly yellow with black accents. - It has a handle on top for easy portability. - The front features a circular dial and a logo. 2. **Accessories**: - **Lance**: A long, black attachment for directing water. - **Surface Cleaner**: A yellow circular attachment with a handle, designed for cleaning flat surfaces. - **Detergent Bottle**: A small bottle of cleaning solution, labeled with instructions and branding. - **Hose**: A coiled black hose for water supply. - **Additional Nozzles**: Two black nozzles with different spray patterns for various cleaning tasks. The set is designed for efficient cleaning of outdoor surfaces, vehicles, and other items requiring high-pressure water. ## Description The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with a blue and white color scheme. The top part of the emblem reads "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" in white text on a blue background. Below this, there is a stylized depiction of a globe with a star above it, also in white, set against a blue background. Underneath the circular emblem, there is a rectangular section with the words "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, uppercase letters. This text is in white on a gold background. The badge signifies that the holder has achieved a Guinness World Record. ## Figure Description The image is a graphic representation with a bold, prominent number "1" on the left side, partially shaded in gray. Adjacent to this number, on a bright yellow background, is the text: - **WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE ONLINE BRAND** This text is centered within the yellow area, emphasizing the brand's leading position in the freelance online market. The use of bold and capitalized letters highlights the importance and authority of the statement. The overall design suggests a focus on leadership and excellence in the freelance industry. ## Description The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag: black, red, and yellow. The design is a stylized, angular shape resembling an arrow or a check mark, with the colors arranged in horizontal bands. Below the design, the text "Made in Germany" is written, indicating the origin of the product or item associated with this logo. The overall appearance suggests a focus on quality and craftsmanship associated with German manufacturing. ## Figure Description The image is a symbol or icon with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized representation of a power plug with a lightning bolt above it, indicating electricity or power. Below the icon, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. This suggests an emphasis on increased power or efficiency. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to ensure visibility and convey the message effectively. ## Description The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle. The nozzle is shown emitting a spray, represented by a series of lines. Above the nozzle, there is a circular arrow with a plus sign, indicating adjustable power or pressure settings. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, providing high contrast for visibility. This icon likely represents a feature on a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power of the spray.

chunks.text:
## Description

The image is a logo featuring the brand name "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and is set against a bright yellow background. Below the brand name, there is a black horizontal line that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to make the brand name stand out prominently.

## K 2 POWER CONTROL HOME

Mit unterstützendem Anwendungsberater via App: der Kärcher K 2 Power Control-Hochdruckreiniger für die Reinigung von z.B. Fahrrädern, Gartenwerkzeugen oder Gartenmöbeln inkl. Home Kit.

## Text from Document

- Pistole mit Click Vario Power-Strahlrohr
- Ausziehbarer Teleskopgriff
- Strahlrohrverstauung

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4054278796116
Stromart V / Hz 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar / MPa 20 - max. 110 / 2 - max. 11
Fördermenge l/h max. 360
Flächenleistung m²/h 20
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung kW 1.4
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 4
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 6.7
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 246 × 280 × 586

## Ausstattung
Home Kit Flächenreiniger T 1, Reinigungsmittel Patio & Deck, 0.5 l
Hochdruckpistole [x]
Vario Power Jet [x]
Click Vario Power-Strahlrohr [ ]
Dreckfräser [ ]
HD-Schlauch 5 m
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugung
Teleskopgriff [ ]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
*Note: "Im Lieferumfang enthalten" is indicated with an asterisk in the document.*

## Description

The image shows a yellow pressure washer set, which includes several components:

1. **Pressure Washer Unit**: 
   - The main body is predominantly yellow with black accents.
   - It has a handle on top for easy portability.
   - The front features a circular dial and a logo.

2. **Accessories**:
   - **Lance**: A long, black attachment for directing water.
   - **Surface Cleaner**: A yellow circular attachment with a handle, designed for cleaning flat surfaces.
   - **Detergent Bottle**: A small bottle of cleaning solution, labeled with instructions and branding.
   - **Hose**: A coiled black hose for water supply.
   - **Additional Nozzles**: Two black nozzles with different spray patterns for various cleaning tasks.

The set is designed for efficient cleaning of outdoor surfaces, vehicles, and other items requiring high-pressure water.

## Description

The image is a badge from the Guinness World Records. It features a circular emblem with a blue and white color scheme. The top part of the emblem reads "GUINNESS WORLD RECORDS" in white text on a blue background. Below this, there is a stylized depiction of a globe with a star above it, also in white, set against a blue background.

Underneath the circular emblem, there is a rectangular section with the words "RECORD HOLDER" in bold, uppercase letters. This text is in white on a gold background.

The badge signifies that the holder has achieved a Guinness World Record.

## Figure Description

The image is a graphic representation with a bold, prominent number "1" on the left side, partially shaded in gray. Adjacent to this number, on a bright yellow background, is the text:

- **WORLD'S NO. 1 FREELANCE ONLINE BRAND**

This text is centered within the yellow area, emphasizing the brand's leading position in the freelance online market. The use of bold and capitalized letters highlights the importance and authority of the statement. The overall design suggests a focus on leadership and excellence in the freelance industry.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag: black, red, and yellow. The design is a stylized, angular shape resembling an arrow or a check mark, with the colors arranged in horizontal bands. Below the design, the text "Made in Germany" is written, indicating the origin of the product or item associated with this logo. The overall appearance suggests a focus on quality and craftsmanship associated with German manufacturing.

## Figure Description

The image is a symbol or icon with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized representation of a power plug with a lightning bolt above it, indicating electricity or power. Below the icon, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. This suggests an emphasis on increased power or efficiency. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast to ensure visibility and convey the message effectively.

## Description

The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle. The nozzle is shown emitting a spray, represented by a series of lines. Above the nozzle, there is a circular arrow with a plus sign, indicating adjustable power or pressure settings. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, providing high contrast for visibility. This icon likely represents a feature on a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power of the spray.
